original_solution_mapping.L1: 36 weeks of school x 2 days of the week = <<36*2=72>>72 days of school
original_solution_mapping.L2: 1 Wednesday + 2 Fridays = <<1+2=3>>3 days of school missed
original_solution_mapping.L3: 72 days of school - 3 days of school missed = <<72-3=69>>69 peanut butter and jelly sandwiches eaten

original_function_code:
def solve():
    """Index: 351.
    Returns: the total number of peanut butter and jelly sandwiches eaten.
    """
    # L1
    school_weeks = 36 # 36 weeks of school
    pbj_days_per_week = 2 # Wednesdays and Fridays
    potential_pbj_days = school_weeks * pbj_days_per_week

    # L2
    missed_wednesdays = 1 # missed 1 Wednesday
    missed_fridays = 2 # missed 2 Fridays
    total_missed_days = missed_wednesdays + missed_fridays

    # L3
    sandwiches_eaten = potential_pbj_days - total_missed_days

    # FA
    answer = sandwiches_eaten
    return answer

logical_steps.solution_line_template: {school_weeks} weeks of school x {pbj_days_per_week} days of the week = <<{school_weeks}*{pbj_days_per_week}={potential_pbj_days}>>{potential_pbj_days} days of school
{missed_wednesdays} Wednesday + {missed_fridays} Fridays = <<{missed_wednesdays}+{missed_fridays}={total_missed_days}>>{total_missed_days} days of school missed

{potential_pbj_days} days of school – {total_missed_days} days of school missed = <<{potential_pbj_days}-{total_missed_days}={sandwiches_eaten}>>{sandwiches_eaten} peanut butter and jelly sandwiches eaten
